verses.verse: The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3315>Japheth;<s%> <S%H1586>Gomer,<s%> and <S%H4031>Magog,<s%> and <S%H4074>Madai,<s%> and <S%H3120>Javan,<s%> and <S%H8422>Tubal,<s%> and <S%H4902>Meshech,<s%> and <S%H8494>Tiras.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3568>Cush;<s%> <S%H5434>Seba,<s%> and <S%H2341>Havilah,<s%> and <S%H5454>Sabta,<s%> and <S%H7484>Raamah,<s%> and <S%H5455>Sabtecha.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7484>Raamah;<s%> <S%H7614>Sheba,<s%> and <S%H1719>Dedan.<s%>
The <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%> also, and the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> and the <S%H1622>Girgashite,<s%>
And the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> and the <S%H6208>Arkite,<s%> and the <S%H5513>Sinite,<s%>
And the <S%H721>Arvadite,<s%> and the <S%H6786>Zemarite,<s%> and the <S%H2577>Hamathite.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem;<s%> <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> and <S%H804>Asshur,<s%> and <S%H775>Arphaxad,<s%> and <S%H3865>Lud,<s%> and <S%H758>Aram,<s%> and <S%H5780>Uz,<s%> and <S%H2343>Hul,<s%> and <S%H1666>Gether,<s%> and <S%H4902>Meshech.<s%>

And unto <S%H5677>Eber<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons:<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H6389>Peleg;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> in his <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H6385>divided:<s%> and his <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3355>Joktan.<s%>
And <S%H211>Ophir,<s%> and <S%H2341>Havilah,<s%> and <S%H3103>Jobab.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3355>Joktan.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are their <S%H8435>generations:<s%> The <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> <S%H5032>Nebaioth;<s%> then <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> and <S%H110>Adbeel,<s%> and <S%H4017>Mibsam,<s%>

Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6989>Keturah,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> <S%H6370>concubine:<s%> she <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2175>Zimran,<s%> and <S%H3370>Jokshan,<s%> and <S%H4091>Medan,<s%> and <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and <S%H3435>Ishbak,<s%> and <S%H7744>Shuah.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3370>Jokshan;<s%> <S%H7614>Sheba,<s%> and <S%H1719>Dedan.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian;<s%> <S%H5891>Ephah,<s%> and <S%H6081>Epher,<s%> and <S%H2585>Henoch,<s%> and <S%H28>Abida,<s%> and <S%H420>Eldaah.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6989>Keturah.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H464>Eliphaz;<s%> <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> and <S%H201>Omar,<s%> <S%H6825>Zephi,<s%> and <S%H1609>Gatam,<s%> <S%H7073>Kenaz,<s%> and <S%H8555>Timna,<s%> and <S%H6002>Amalek.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir;<s%> <S%H3877>Lotan,<s%> and <S%H7732>Shobal,<s%> and <S%H6649>Zibeon,<s%> and <S%H6034>Anah,<s%> and <S%H1787>Dishon,<s%> and <S%H687>Ezer,<s%> and <S%H1789>Dishan.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3877>Lotan;<s%> <S%H2753>Hori,<s%> and <S%H1950>Homam:<s%> and <S%H8555>Timna<s%> was <S%H3877>Lotan's<s%> <S%H269>sister.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7732>Shobal;<s%> <S%H5935>Alian,<s%> and <S%H4506>Manahath,<s%> and <S%H5858>Ebal,<s%> <S%H8195>Shephi,<s%> and <S%H208>Onam.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon;<s%> <S%H345>Aiah,<s%> and <S%H6034>Anah.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah;<s%> <S%H1787>Dishon.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1787>Dishon;<s%> <S%H2566>Amram,<s%> and <S%H790>Esh-ban,<s%> and <S%H3506>Ithran,<s%> and <S%H3763>Cheran.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H687>Ezer;<s%> <S%H1092>Bilhan,<s%> and <S%H2190>Zavan,<s%> and <S%H3292>Jakan.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1789>Dishan;<s%> <S%H5780>Uz,<s%> and <S%H765>Aran.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> any <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H1106>Bela<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor:<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H1838>Dinhabah.<s%>
And when <S%H1106>Bela<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H3103>Jobab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> of <S%H4480>Bozrah<s%> <S%H1224><s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>
And when <S%H3103>Jobab<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H2367>Husham<s%> of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of the <S%H8489>Temanites<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>

And when <S%H2367>Husham<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H1908>Hadad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H911>Bedad,<s%> which <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4080>Midian<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead:<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H5762>Avith.<s%>
And when <S%H1908>Hadad<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H8072>Samlah<s%> of <S%H4480>Masrekah<s%> <S%H4957><s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>
And when <S%H8072>Samlah<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> of <S%H4480>Rehoboth<s%> <S%H7344><s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>
And when <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H1177>Baal-hanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5907>Achbor<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>

And when <S%H1177>Baal-hanan<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H1908>Hadad<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead:<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H6464>Pai;<s%> and his <S%H802>wife's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4105>Mehetabel,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4308>Matred,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4314>Mezahab.<s%>
